sentence.Network_en: He worked awhile as a pharmacist in Cincinnati.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有一段时间在辛辛那提当药剂师。

sentence.Network_en: After dinner sit awhile, after supper walk a mile.
sentence.Network_cn: 正餐以后,休息片刻;晚餐以后, 步行一里.

sentence.Network_en: The bus is not due yet awhile.
sentence.Network_cn: 公共汽车还要一会儿才会来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the first is where we are with a partner that we have been in relationship with for awhile and all of a sudden , we see someone new coming along who seems much more attractive to us .我们在关系里面都有伙伴，与他们相处了一段时间后，会突然发觉身边有很多更吸引我们的人。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... awheel 骑脚踏车的 awhile 片刻 awhirl 旋转的.
新编大学英语单词表(第四册) - 豆丁网 ... astonishment n. 惊奇， 惊讶 awhile ad. 一会儿， 片刻， 暂时 bait n. 诱饵， 诱惑物.

list.abs: 英文歌曲800首 - 狗狗的日志 - 网易博客 ... Stay another day 再停留一天  — Stay awhile 停留一会儿  — Bells 铃铛合唱团.
欧美浪漫贵族舞曲精... ... 04 乡村小路引我回家 Take me home country road 05 留下来吧 Stay awhile 06 但愿是我 Let it be me.
宝贝~ 别想太长远 - nan 的储藏室 - udn部落格 ... Burning_ 为爱燃烧 Stay Awhile _ 停留片刻 Gloomy Sunday_ 黑色星期天.
yet_百度百科 ... not yet 尚未，还没有 yet awhile （用于否定句）还要一段时间，还要一会儿 yet once more 再一次.
yet_百度百科 ... not yet 尚未，还没有 yet awhile （用于否定句）还要一段时间，还要一会儿 yet once more 再一次.
as the repairs will take awhile , we will over a replacement unit for you to use later this afternoon .由于修理要花点时间，今天下午晚一点我们会送一套更换装置给您们使用。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  āne hwīle '(for) a while'

entry.tran: 片刻，一会儿（英国英语中常拼作a while)
entry.def: Awhile means for a short time. It is more commonly spelled 'a while', which is considered more correct, especially in British English.

example.ex: He worked awhile as a pharmacist in Cincinnati.
example.tran: 他有一段时间在辛辛那提当药剂师。

sentences.sentence: "they settled awhile in Virginia before moving West"
"the baby was quiet for a while"

auth_sentence.content: Fine, let them pay for science for awhile.
